TopicTitle: Dark Multiplayer: Interplanetary Warfare Server! (Sandbox + Career)

Articles.Content:
If only we could take SWDennis's Jaegers and do a battle to the death on the server...

Nah, just thinking aloud..

> 
> If only we could take SWDennis's Jaegers and do a battle to the death on the server...
> Nah, just thinking aloud..

did he even release the Jaegers to the public?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89949-Pacific-Rim-Jaeger-Jebsy-Danger?highlight=jaeger](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89949-Pacific-Rim-Jaeger-Jebsy-Danger?highlight=jaeger)
BDArmory is not working properly at the moment because it has syncing issues. Hopefully later we can get it working.

\*starts Tiger engine\* 

Count me in.

Server Mod Whitelist Suggestion:

[FAR](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20451-1-0-4-Ferram-Aerospace-Research-v0-15-4-Glauert-7-12-15)

[BDArmory](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-2-BDArmory-v0-8-3-%28critical-fixes-improved-AI%29-Dev-Thread-May-30) (if we manage to get it working)

[Infernal Robotics](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116064-1-0-4-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-21-3) (for more advanced stuff; although this one isn't the most important)

[Procedural Fairings](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-1-0-4-Procedural-Fairings-3-15-%28June-27%29) (if FAR is used)

[TweakScale](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110899) (if BDArmory doesn't work; that way we can make small missiles/weapons)

[TweakableEverything](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64711-1-0-TweakableEverything-1-12-For-all-your-part-tweaking-needs)

[Editor Extension](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38768-1-0-3-Editor-Extensions-v2-12-23-June) (Helps a lot in building crafts)

[RCS Build Aid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35996-1-0-2-RCS-Build-Aid-v0-7-2) (also helps a lot in building crafts)

[ATM](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-1-0-Release-5-0-April-28-2015-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM!)(to increase FPS)

[KerbinSide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785-0-90-Kerbin-Side-v0-41-Go-For-Multi-Launch) (for multiple bases)

Good idea, I'll throw this onto the main private forums of the server. But wait, it's Kerbtown, not KerbinSide that we're using.

> 
> Good idea, I'll throw this onto the main private forums of the server. But wait, it's Kerbtown, not KerbinSide that we're using.

I don't want to be picky, but Kerbinside is an addon pack for the mod Kerbal Konstructs.

> 
> I don't want to be picky, but Kerbinside is an addon pack for the mod Kerbal Konstructs.

Is Kerbal Konstructs not Kerbtown? It was Windows who said Kerbinside, I said Kerbtown. You get the idea at least...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-21T22:55:50Z" title="07/21/2015 10:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 21, 2015</time> by Techiastronamo**

> 
> I don't want to be picky, but Kerbinside is an addon pack for the mod Kerbal Konstructs.

AFAIK Tech's making custom airports for the server, using KerbTown.

> 
> AFAIK Tech's making custom airports for the server, using KerbTown.

And contracts... but this is plan B. If war doesn't work, then it'll be Interplanetary Astrocapitalism where players run transportation companies across the system.

> 
> Is Kerbal Konstructs not Kerbtown? It was Windows who said Kerbinside, I said Kerbtown. You get the idea at least...

Actually.. Kerbal Konstructs is the successor to Kerbtown, as kerbtown hasn't been updated for over a year.

But Kerbtown addons do work on Kerbal Konstructs.

> 
> Actually.. Kerbal Konstructs is the successor to Kerbtown, as kerbtown hasn't been updated for over a year.
> But Kerbtown addons do work on Kerbal Konstructs.

Ah, Kerbal Konstructs is what I shall use then rather than Kerbtown!

> 
> Ah, Kerbal Konstructs is what I shall use then rather than Kerbtown!

Also: it's best to install Kerbinside first, and then update Kerbal konstructs: kerbinside comes with KK, but not with the latest version.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T02:19:37Z" title="07/22/2015 02:19  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by MK3424**

> 
> Also: it's best to install Kerbinside first, and then update Kerbal konstructs: kerbinside comes with KK, but not with the latest version.

Why'd I use Kerbinside if I plan on making my own cities and airports, not premade places?

> 
> Why'd I use Kerbinside if I plan on making my own cities and airports, not premade places?

it may be easier to start with them and later use your own, but if you gonna build your own, then who am i to say to go with only Kerbinside?

> 
> it may be easier to start with them and later use your own, but if you gonna build your own, then who am i to say to go with only Kerbinside?

Meh, I don't like the scenery with Kerbinside, so I'll just stick to making my own scenery and my own contracts.
Updated server... BDArmory should work now if the directions were followed.
KAX and Firespitter are now 2 new included mods for the servers!
Bump, the server's quite dead...

ill join with a friend, hes a noob on space stuff but hes cool at all ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
